citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
During the inspection it was noted that that program of veterinary care did not include the ducks or chickens. The license
reported that in that past her vet has not wanted to see the birds. Not having a veterinarian that is willing and
knowledgeable in the treating of poultry could lead to illness and prolonged suffering for the animals.
In the case of a part-time attending veterinarian, the formal arrangement shall include a written program of veterinary care
that covers all licensed species.
Correction date: May 17th, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.40(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
During the inspection it was noted that that program of veterinary care did not include the ducks or chickens. The license 
reported that in that past her vet has not wanted to see the birds. Not having a veterinarian that is willing and 
knowledgeable in the treating of poultry could lead to illness and prolonged suffering for the animals.  
In the case of a part-time attending veterinarian, the formal arrangement shall include a written program of veterinary care 
that covers all licensed species.  
Correction date: May 17th, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
